title: Cannot connect to any game whatsoever?
body:
This all started 2 days ago when I was playing perfectly fine with no lag issues or anything, but after that I couldn't join a single game , it keeps showing up the same error over and over again.
 "_Network warning : You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again._" 
So 1st of all, my ping is 80-100 (_which is my normal ping_)
2nd everything works in the League client from buying champions to chatting with your friends, but when I try to enter a game after champ select this whole thing starts over and over again.
No matter how much times I try reconnecting, it just shows up the same error, whether i was close to 100% or not close.
_OCASIONALLY_, I actually connect to the game, but after 5 seconds I disconnect and it says "_Attempting to reconnect_" forever if i dont exit manually.
When I DO exit manually from the game, and try to reconnect the problem i stated  above just repeats again like i didn't even connect to the game.
Thats if the game is still going..
  
Fixes I have tried :

1) Repairing LoL from the launcher
2) Deleting the game.cfg file
3) forcing a repatch (idk why i did this but i did it)
4) allowing LoL pass my firewall
5) closing all my firewall and anti-virus
6) something like "netsh int ip reset" and "netsh winsock reset" and restarting the computer
7) Giving up and heading here, hoping for someone to help me out.. will you?
Please post a fix soon {{summoner:4}}  , i am getting really tired of this. {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
This happened so suddenly , and so randomly , and i've tried many fixes.... should i just reinstall the game?
I have noticed that people having same or similar problems try to reinstall the game but the issue still persists...
BUT I really goddamn give up about trying to fix this anymore. It's just stupid and absolutely ZERO fixes work


{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

I wouldn't recommend deleting or modifying files as that can end up causing more trouble.  Even though your internet might be fine, it sounds like your network is still having some trouble connecting to our servers.  My suggestion would be to go over the list of steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0EuHwkb0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-23T15:58:44.442+0000)
>
> I wouldn't recommend deleting or modifying files as that can end up causing more trouble.  Even though your internet might be fine, it sounds like your network is still having some trouble connecting to our servers.  My suggestion would be to go over the list of steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!

I tried many of the fixes, but its the same issue with nothing solved.
Turning firewall completely off didn't work
Configuring DNS didn't work
Port forwarding everything didn't work
I don't use VPN's or Proxy's
Releasing / Renewing / Flushing IP address and restarting didn't work

Is there a way to maybe send my logs or something like that, so you can have more information and a better way to help me fix my issue? If so... can you tell me how do I send you these things ? And where to find them?

Absolutely!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help out!  You can attach your logs in the ticket to give some more context.  You can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically obtain logs easily.  We'll respond to your ticket asap!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0EuHwkb0,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-23T17:51:31.366+0000)
>
> Absolutely!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help out!  You can attach your logs in the ticket to give some more context.  You can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically obtain logs easily.  We'll respond to your ticket asap!

Thanks alot! I have sent a support ticket just right now, and I hope there will be a response.
BTW how will I be recieving that response? Sorry, im not that familliar with support tickets.
Edit : Request #23021901
Our queue is a bit high right now so it may be a little bit.  Just make sure not to reply to your ticket as that can bump it back to the bottom.  Hang tight!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0EuHwkb0,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-23T18:50:20.425+0000)
>
> Our queue is a bit high right now so it may be a little bit.  Just make sure not to reply to your ticket as that can bump it back to the bottom.  Hang tight!

Ok but I hope you reply soon, me and my friend really wanted to do this thresh/blitzcrank duo botlane combo in normals, and thresh is in F2P champs!!! Why did this error come up right when thresh comes into free champion rotation?!{{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}
